description.value:
You can get extra oomph out of your powered weaponry, at great expense to the weapon.

Prerequisites: Engineering 5 ranks

Benefit: As a full action, you can attack with a ranged weapon that deals energy damage and uses batteries or a melee weapon with the powered weapon special property. If you hit, you deal 1 additional die of damage per 5 item levels (minimum 1) of the same type the weapon normally deals. This attack causes the weapon to gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.2sVSvaOrr3uLW8Uq]{broken} condition. You can instead use this ability as a standard action on a qualifying weapon that is unattended or wielded by a willing ally to grant the same effect to that weaponâ€™s next attack before the beginning of your next turn.
